word:
At present I am very short of funds. I have no money in the bank; in fact, I have over-drawn my account there. I hope that some money will come in soon. I think I shall bend my energies toward getting out some new books, until things become more settled. Then we shall better understand what we 


                                    -140- 

ought to do in regard to getting out a new edition of Patriarchs and Prophets.--Letter 150, 1903, p. 1. (To "Dear Son Edson," July 19, 1903.)
